description: I Letter dated 14/07/2009 from Angela Eagle MP regarding Pensions Regulator response. 1 p. II. Consultation report. A response from the Pensions Regulator. A review of the Trustee Knowledge and Understanding (TKU) code of practice (code of practice no. 7) and scope guidance. 13 p. III. 3 TKU Code of Practice and Scope Guidance documents.
